japanese:
（はあ、やっと解放された。
　あいつら相手に、昨日からの経緯を説明するのが
　こんなに大変だとはな……）
translation:
(Haah, I'm finally free.
 Since yesterday I had no idea how I could explain
 the situation to them...)

japanese:
（それだけ、心配してくれてたって
　ことなんだろうが、さすがにクタクタだ……）
translation:
(I'm glad that they worry about me,
 but I'm completely exhausted...)

japanese:
開いてるぞー。
勝手に入ってくれ。
translation:
It's open.
Come on in.

japanese: 失礼しまーす。
translation: Coooming in.

japanese: 本日の質疑応答は終了したんだが――
translation: The interrogation for today is over%p-2;――

japanese: って、なんだ四葉か。
translation: Oh, it's Yotsuba.

japanese: お邪魔します！
translation: Sorry for bothering you!

japanese: お前も、あいつらの質問攻めから解放されたか。
translation:
Have you also been released
from their barrage of questions?

japanese:
はい、なんとか。
なかなか大変でしたね。
translation:
Yeah, somehow.
That was really tough, huh?

japanese:
こっちが順を追って話そうとしてんのに、
次から次と質問してくるしな。
translation:
I was trying to explain things in an order that 
made sense, but they kept bombarding me 
with more and more questions.

japanese:
しかも、みんな質問の内容が
バラバラというオマケ付きでしたから。
困っちゃいました。
translation:
And to make things worse, 
the questions were all over the place.
I was really in a pickle.

japanese:
まったくだ。
一花が所々でフォローしてくれなきゃ、
話を進めることもできなかっただろ、あれは。
translation:
That's for sure.
If Ichika didn't help you out sometimes,
the conversation wouldn't have made progress.

japanese:
一花はいつもと同じ感じでしたけど、
二乃はとーっても怒ってましたね。
すごく叱られちゃいました。
translation:
Ichika seemed like her usual self,
but Nino was reeeally angry.
She scolded me a bunch.

japanese:
三玖も相当、怒ってたなぁ。
静かな分、二乃より迫力あったような……。
translation:
Miku was pretty angry too.
Her being quiet most of the time made her anger 
even more scary...

japanese:
五月は、ずーっとムスッとしてましたね。
もっと叱られると思ってたので、意外でした。
translation:
Itsuki was sullenly brooding the WHOLE time.
I thought she was going to scold me even more. 
I was kinda surprised she didn't.

japanese:
まあ、あいつはあいつなりに、
思うところがあるんだろ。
translation:
Well, she probably has her own reasons why she 
held back.

japanese:
色々と叱られたり、怒られたりも
しちゃいましたけど……。
translation:
Although everyone really scolded and reprimanded us
in various ways...

japanese:
みんなが心配してくれてたのが伝わってきて、
なんだか嬉しくなっちゃいました。
translation:
I could feel that everyone was worried,
and that kinda made me happy.

japanese:
（……嬉しくなった、か。
　四葉の気持ちも、少しは軽くなってるみたいだな）
translation:
(...That made her happy, huh?
 Yotsuba's mood seems to have 
 lightened up a bit, too.)

japanese: 上杉さん？　どうしたんですか？
translation: Uesugi-san? What's up?

japanese:
ああ、いや、怒られてんのに
妙にニコニコしてやがると思ってたが、
そういうことだったのか。
translation:
Oh, well, I was just wondering
why you were smirking even though
we've been grilled by everybody. Now I know why.

japanese:
あれ？
そんなに顔に出てましたか？
translation:
Oh?
Was it that obvious?

japanese:
ああ、はたから見ててもわかるくらいにな。
おかげで俺にもとばっちりが回ってきてたんだぞ？
真面目に聞けって。
translation:
Yes, even from a bystander's perspective.
Thanks to that, I got caught up in the fray as well.
They grilled me hard, telling me to take them seriously.

japanese:
ええ～？
それはさすがに言い掛かりっぽくないですか？
translation:
Whaaa?
Doesn't it sound like a false accusation?

japanese:
いいや、そんなことはない！
さあ、この落とし前どうつけてもらおうか。
translation:
I don't think they meant it THAT way!
Now, let's figure out how to settle this.

japanese:
あ、だったら、心配かけてしまったお詫びに
みんなにスイーツを奢る約束をしたので……。
translation:
Oh, in that case,
as an apology for worrying them,
I promised to treat everyone to some sweets...

japanese: よし、俺にも奢ってくれ。
translation: Great, please treat me as well.

japanese:
はい、そうしましょう。
みんなで一緒に、上杉さんの
バイト先のお店に行きますね。
translation:
Sure, let's do that.
Let's all go to the restaurant
where you work, Uesugi-san.

japanese: それは……いや……。
translation: Uh... Nah...

japanese: あれ？　何か問題ありますか？
translation: Huh? Is there a problem?

japanese:
……あの店長、俺のバイト代から引くとか、
勝手なことをしそうで不安があるんだよ。
translation:
...I'm just worried that the manager
might deduct my pay without permission.

japanese:
あはは、大丈夫ですよ。
何があろうと、ちゃんと私が払いますから！
translation:
Ahaha, don't worry.
No matter what happens, I'll pay for everything!

japanese:
あ、でも、上杉さんには、
いっぱいお世話になっちゃいましたから――
translation:
Oh, but, you've taken so much care of me lately, 
Uesugi-san%p-2;――

japanese:
お詫びではなくて、ちゃんとした形でも
お礼させてください。
translation:
Please allow me to thank you not only as an 
apology, but also for your help in a proper way.

japanese:
そんなに世話したつもりはないぞ。
俺だって、お前の世話になったんだし。
translation:
I didn't do much to deserve all of this.
You helped me a lot too, ya know.

japanese: その程度でよかったな。
translation: I think that's good enough.

japanese:
はい、みんな優しいんです。
本当はもっと色々お詫びをしたほうが
いいくらいなのに。
translation:
Yes, everyone is so kind. To the point that I feel like I 
could have apologized for a lot more.

japanese:
だから、これから先、みんなを手助けすることで
少しずつ返していきます。
translation:
That's why from now on,
I'll gradually repay everyone by helping them out.

japanese:
あ、でも、そこはみんなには内緒で！
きっと、そんなことしなくてもいいって
言われちゃいますから。
translation:
Oh, but keep that a secret from everyone!
They'll probably say it's not necessary.

japanese:
ともかく、まずはスイーツです！
上杉さんも一緒に行きましょうね。
私が全部、奢っちゃいますから。
translation:
Anyway, let's start with some sweets!
Uesugi-san, please join us.
I'll treat everyone.

japanese:
あ、でも、上杉さんには、
いっぱいお世話になっちゃいましたから――
translation:
Oh, but, you've taken so much care of me lately, 
Uesugi-san%p-2;――

japanese:
お詫びではなくて、ちゃんとした形でも
お礼させてください。
translation:
Please allow me to thank you not only as an 
apology, but also for your help in a proper way.

japanese:
そんなに世話したつもりはないぞ。
俺だって、お前の世話になったんだし。
translation:
I didn't do much to deserve all of this.
You helped me a lot too, ya know.

japanese: それも想い出だな。
translation: This'll become a great memory too.

japanese:
……ですね。
そこまで含めて、ちゃんと心にしまっておきます。
translation:
...You're right.
And I'll keep it in mind.

japanese:
だが、ここで四葉だけに
奢らせるわけにもいかないよな。
俺にも責任があったんだし。
translation:
But I can't just let you treat them by yourself.
I'm also responsible for this.

japanese:
いえいえ！
これは私たち姉妹の約束ですから。
translation:
No, it's fine!
This is a promise between sisters.

japanese:
そういうわけにもいかないだろ？
せめてワリカンとかで……。
translation:
That won't do it, ya know?
Let's at least split the bill...

japanese:
もう、上杉さんの分も私が奢っちゃいますよ。
だから、一緒に行きましょうね？
translation:
Now now, I'll treat you too, Uesugi-san.
Now, let's go together, okay?

japanese:
あ、でも、上杉さんには、
いっぱいお世話になっちゃいましたから――
translation:
Oh, but, you've taken so much care of me lately, 
Uesugi-san%p-2;――

japanese:
お詫びではなくて、ちゃんとした形でも
お礼させてください。
translation:
Please allow me to thank you not only as an 
apology, but also for your help in a proper way.

japanese:
そんなに世話したつもりはないぞ。
俺だって、お前の世話になったんだし。
translation:
I didn't do much to deserve all of this.
You helped me a lot too, ya know.

japanese:
いいえ、上杉さんのおかげで
素敵な夏の想い出ができました。
translation:
No, thanks to you, Uesugi-san,
I was able to make wonderful summer memories.

japanese:
……私にはもったいないくらいの素敵なものです。
だから、お礼をしたいんです。
translation:
...It's something so wonderful
that it's almost too good to be true.
That's why I want to thank you.

japanese: はああぁぁ……。
translation: *sigh*

japanese: あ、あの、どうしてそんな大きなため息を……。
translation: U-um, why the long sigh?

japanese:
いいか、四葉。
夏はまだ終わってないんだし、
夏の先にだって、いくらでも時間はある。
translation:
Listen, Yotsuba.
Summer isn't over yet, and there's plenty of time
even after the summer holidays are over.

japanese:
この程度でいちいち礼なんてしてたら
切りがないだろ。
上杉さん……。
translation: Uesugi-san...

japanese: 今度は迷子よりも、もっといい想い出を作ろうぜ。
translation:
Let's make even better memories next time,
instead of getting lost.

japanese: ……はい。
translation: ...Okay.

japanese:
これからも、この先も……
いっぱい素敵な想い出が作れるように
私も頑張りますね。
translation:
I will do my best...
to create many more wonderful memories with you
from here on out.
